CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please provide your instructions on what you would like for Nokia to do with this part now that you have rejected Nokia's quote
CustomField.label: Disposition Instructions

value.fullName: I am transferring ownership of this product to Nokia and relinquishing Nokia of all further obligation.
value.label: I am transferring ownership of this product to Nokia and relinquishing Nokia of all further obligation.

value.fullName: I will arrange for the return of this product and agree to compensate Nokia for all services performed including facilitating its return.
value.label: I will arrange for the return of this product and agree to compensate Nokia for all services performed including facilitating its return.
